words.def: meet formally
an assembly of witches
the present occasion
a small inlet
kitchen appliance used for baking or roasting
the upper part of a glacier (beyond the limit of perpetual snow) where the snow turns to ice
the latter part of the day (the period of decreasing daylight from late afternoon until nightfall)
on one occasion
conduct or direct the steering of a ship or plane
any cone-shaped artifact
The Hawaiian goose , Branta sandvicensis, now the state bird  of Hawaii.
a colorless odorless gaseous element that give a red glow in a vacuum tube
a canonical hour that is the ninth hour of the day counting from sunrise
A narrow sea inlet, particularly in the Shetland Islands, similar to a fjord.
Something with the shape of the letter V. Found in compounds such as vee-necked.
(Old Testament) Adam's wife in Judeo-Christian mythology: the first woman and mother of the human race
an argument opposed to a proposal
Something shaped like the letter C, such as a cee spring .
the smallest whole number or a numeral representing this number
(meaning literally `born') used to indicate the maiden or family name of a married woman
the longest division of geological time
Not.
in operation or operational
A small island.
a negative
half the width of an em
